verses.verse: וְהֶחֱזִיקוּ֩ <S%H2388><s%> ve-he-che-zi-Ku shall take hold שֶׁ֨בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' seven נָשִׁ֜ים <S%H802><s%> na-Shim women בְּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> be-'Ish man אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, of one בַּיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom And in that day הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying לַחְמֵ֣נוּ <S%H3899><s%> lach-Me-nu our own bread נֹאכֵ֔ל <S%H398><s%> no-Chel, We will eat וְשִׂמְלָתֵ֖נוּ <S%H8071><s%> ve-sim-la-Te-nu our own apparel נִלְבָּ֑שׁ <S%H3847><s%> nil-Bash; and wear רַ֗ק <S%H7535><s%> Rak, let יִקָּרֵ֤א <S%H7121><s%> yik-ka-Re only let us be called שִׁמְךָ֙ <S%H8034><s%> shim-Cha by thy name עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu, and אֱסֹ֖ף <S%H622><s%> 'e-Sof to take away חֶרְפָּתֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H2781><s%> cher-pa-Te-nu. our reproach ס sa-Mek

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he יִֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become צֶ֣מַח <S%H6780><s%> Tze-mach shall the branch יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD לִצְבִ֖י <S%H6643><s%> litz-Vi be beautiful וּלְכָב֑וֹד <S%H3519><s%> u-le-cha-Vod; and glorious וּפְרִ֤י <S%H6529><s%> u-fe-Ri and the fruit הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the earth לְגָא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> le-ga-'on [shall be] excellent וּלְתִפְאֶ֔רֶת <S%H8597><s%> u-le-tif-'E-ret, and comely for לִפְלֵיטַ֖ת <S%H6413><s%> lif-lei-Tat them that are escaped יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וְהָיָ֣ה׀ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will come הַנִּשְׁאָ֣ר <S%H7604><s%> han-nish-'Ar And it shall come to pass [that he that is] left בְּצִיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> be-tzi-Yon, in Zion וְהַנּוֹתָר֙ <S%H3498><s%> ve-han-no-Tar and [he that] remaineth בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-Ru-sha-Lim, in Jerusalem קָד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> ka-Doosh holy יֵאָ֣מֶר <S%H559><s%> ye-'A-mer shall be called ל֑וֹ lo; כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- who הַכָּת֥וּב <S%H3789><s%> hak-ka-Tuv [even] every one that is written לַחַיִּ֖ים <S%H2416><s%> la-chai-Yim among the living בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim. in Jerusalem

אִ֣ם׀ <S%H518><s%> 'im When רָחַ֣ץ <S%H7364><s%> ra-Chatz shall have washed away אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai, When the Lord אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et צֹאַ֣ת <S%H6675><s%> tzo-'At the filth בְּנוֹת־ <S%H1323><s%> be-not- of the daughters צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon, of Zion וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et דְּמֵ֥י <S%H1818><s%> de-Mei the blood יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem יָדִ֣יחַ <S%H1740><s%> ya-Di-ach and shall have purged מִקִּרְבָּ֑הּ <S%H7130><s%> mik-kir-Bah; from the midst בְּר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> be-Ru-ach thereof by the spirit מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat of judgment וּבְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> u-ve-Ru-ach and by the spirit בָּעֵֽר׃ <S%H1197><s%> ba-'Er. of burning

וּבָרָ֣א <S%H1254><s%> u-va-Ra will create יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God עַל֩ <S%H5921><s%> 'al over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole מְכ֨וֹן <S%H4349><s%> me-Chon upon every dwelling place הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- of mount צִיּ֜וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon Zion וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and over מִקְרָאֶ֗הָ <S%H4744><s%> mik-ra-'E-ha, and upon her assemblies עָנָ֤ן׀ <S%H6051><s%> 'a-Nan a cloud יוֹמָם֙ <S%H3119><s%> yo-Mam by day וְעָשָׁ֔ן <S%H6227><s%> ve-'a-Shan, and smoke וְנֹ֛גַהּ <S%H5051><s%> ve-No-gah and the shining אֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh fire לֶהָבָ֖ה <S%H3852><s%> le-ha-Vah of a flaming לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> La-ye-lah; by night כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all כָּב֖וֹד <S%H3519><s%> ka-Vod for upon all the glory חֻפָּֽה׃ <S%H2646><s%> chup-Pah. [shall be] a defence

וְסֻכָּ֛ה <S%H5521><s%> ve-suk-Kah And there shall be a tabernacle תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become לְצֵל־ <S%H6738><s%> le-tzel- for a shadow יוֹמָ֖ם <S%H3119><s%> yo-Mam in the daytime מֵחֹ֑רֶב <S%H2721><s%> me-Cho-rev; from the heat וּלְמַחְסֶה֙ <S%H4268><s%> u-le-mach-Seh and for a place of refuge וּלְמִסְתּ֔וֹר <S%H4563><s%> u-le-mis-Tor, and for a covert מִזֶּ֖רֶם <S%H2230><s%> miz-Ze-rem from storm וּמִמָּטָֽר׃ <S%H4306><s%> u-mi-ma-Tar. and from rain פ Peh
